page.title: 11T.A.UNIT_EAST KILBRIDE
page.content: T.A.UNIT---EAST KILBRIDE. Within our designated area we have a {TERRITORIAL ARMY UNIT-}T.A.for short. It is called 222 squadron of{ROYAL {CORPS OF TRANSPORT.}Eighty per cent of the volunteer members of this unit live in East Kilbride and they train two evenings a week and at week-ends. They are not full-time soldiers,but their training is very tough and in a national emergency they could be called upon to defend our country. Their headquarters in the town consist of a huge drill hall and garaging for large army vehicles and during a sortie from the unit,the vehicles travel in convoy. This week-end 21-6-85 the unit go on exercise to LINCOLNSHIRE,ENGLAND for two weeks.
